Context for cookbook title: Before converting me, @SuzyPatrick always used to get me to try vegan alternatives, to which I would always say, “That’s some vegan bullshit right there.” Now that I’m vegan it’s become a term of endearment.

Once again I’m here to tout a great product from @VeryGoodButcher. These Smokin’ Burgers make for terrific burgers. Best of all, they’re B.C. local. Definitely going in my “Some Vegan Bullshit” cookbook, should I ever write one. https://t.co/QPGoyJRuUC

02.23.2018: Considered phoning it in. Terrible commute but car performed well. Witnessed several poor decisions. Finally made camp this morning @globalbc in Burnaby. Snow relentless. Food supply low. Morale lower. Ice scraper MIA. What fresh hell is this?

@KristenThom @HC_Women People have every right to be shocked and disappointed. I'm just saying I get it. Hell, I've done it. Just, you know, not at the Olympics.

@KristenThom @HC_Women I think we need to give her a break. So she took her medal off -- who cares? She just had her dream snatched away from her in a shootout. She's pissed -- rightly so. Best display of sportsmanship? No. But embarrassment to country? Let's take it down a notch, eh?
